alert.note: Alert for Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 24 at 2:40AM CST until December 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Windy, very warm, and dry conditions expected Friday afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND NEAR RECORD TEMPERATURES PARTS OF WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds, low humidity and near record temperatures, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. * TIMING...Noon to 6 PM. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Low to mid 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start in this environment will become very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
